children.title: 2020-04-21 Total Cloud Cover 78 hour forecast visualized with H3, Leaflet.js and D3.
children.description: This was produced by taking the grid data from National Digital Forecast Database then processing to H3 indexes at various resolutions then visualizing via GeoJSON.
